title: Speed
description: Visit Luna Beach for sandy beaches and summer love.Jessica McNally is right where she wants to be…days away from the start of the Baja 250 race she’s prepared for most of her life. After an accident, she crashes into love with mysterious Kyle Lewis, a doctor who tries to resist giving his heart to someone who could easily die for her love of racing. Can he take that risk ...or will it end before it even begins?
author: Sarah   Collins
